any.TV is a new kind of YouTube Network that pays recommendation revenue, a new revenue stream for you, in addition to YouTube ad revenue.

Good news: any.TV is open to all YouTubers in all Networks! Why? We do not partner YouTube channels, so you can work with both any.TV and your favorite YouTube Network at the same time.

any.TV is like Amazon.com, but instead of Buy Now links we offer Play Now links to (mostly) free-to-play games. All you do is tell your audience where to go to play the game by adding a Play Now link in your video description.

Game publishers pay you every time someone new starts playing their game after clicking your Play Now link.

A new kind of YouTube Network

Don’t unpartner from your YouTube Network — really — see details below
 

Earn about $1.00 every time someone new plays a game after watching your video or live stream!

Seriously — see the any.TV games list ›

any.TV is a new kind of YouTube Network that pays recommendation revenue, a new revenue stream, in addition to YouTube ad revenue, open to all YouTubers in all Networks.

any.TV Best Practices

Make a Playlist

Put all your videos with a Play Now link into a playlist.

Just like this or like this:
➜ www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCiaGqCFd9TlrCnHYjz0PO-DYOjn8W4lD

Why?

So your audience can find a game they love more easily!

Start with Your Best 10 Seconds

Start all your videos with the most exciting 10 seconds first, then play your intro, then the full video.

Why?

This will grab your audience attention early so they watch more of your videos!

Tell Your Friends

Give your Refer-a-Friend link to your friends and partners.

Why?

You will earn a lifetime 10% bonus on top of everything they make as our way of saying “Thank You” for sharing any.TV!

For example, here is George’s Refer-a-Friend link:
➜ www.dashboard.tm/signup/1000

Why Choose any.TV?

  • YES to sub-Networks! You can start your own sub-Network on any.TV by clicking: Join any.TV
  • Earn new any.TV recommendation revenue on top of your YouTube and Twitch ad revenue
  • See all your revenue in real time on our dashboard
  • If you liked George when he was the President of TGN, you will like any.TV!
  • Make videos and live streams only about the things you love
  • Earn 10 times more revenue per video, about $11 CPM paid to you (recommendation revenue pays a lot more, and in addition to, regular YouTube and Twitch ad revenue, just by adding a “Play Now” link into your video descriptions)
